data.name: Countdown Final Zone
data.detailed_description:
COUNTDOWN FINAL ZONE

is a dynamic first-person shooter.
Fight on large post-apocalyptic maps using a variety of deadly weapons.
Get ready for epic combat in battle royale, deathmatch and team deathmatch modes.

BATTLE ROYALE, DEATHMATCH AND TEAM DEATHMATCH

.You will face up to 32 players on large maps to win a round.
Find weapons and dominate the map in dynamic gameplay.

BATTLE ROYALE - you have one life, whoever stays last wins.
DEATHMATCH - you against everyone
TEAM DEATHMATCH - you and your team on the battlefield, best team wins

data.short_description: COUNTDOWN FINAL ZONE is a dynamic first person shooter. Fight on large post-apocalyptic maps using a variety of deadly weapons. Get ready for epic battle royale, deathmatch and team deathmatch modes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 4 Core or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: geforce 1050 Ti

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
